header.title: Mnesia User's Guide
header.prepared: Claes Wikström, Hans Nilsson and Håkan Mattsson

description.p: The Mnesia application is a distributed Database Management System (DBMS), appropriate for telecommunications applications and other Erlang applications, which require continuous operation and exhibit soft real-time properties.
